item.title: By: Brent Shepherd
item.dc:creator: Brent Shepherd
item.description:
A beautiful example of oversized graphics and parallax scrolling.
If you want to create a similar site, you can with WordPress (http://wordpress.org) and Five3 (http://five3.me).
It would be great to get a Parallax category on here too.
item.content:encoded:
A beautiful example of oversized graphics and parallax scrolling.

If you want to create a similar site, you can with WordPress (http://wordpress.org) and Five3 (http://five3.me).

It would be great to get a Parallax category on here too.
